content:
Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart is definitely one of the most anticipated games of the year!

According to Insomniac Games, the developers of the game, Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart will feature a campaign that's around 10-15 hours long, depending on the player's skill level and playstyle. However, there will be plenty of replay value, as the game will include multiple difficulty levels, a variety of upgrades and collectibles, and a New Game Plus mode.

As for the number of planets, Insomniac Games has confirmed that the game will feature multiple planets, but the exact number hasn't been revealed. However, we do know that each planet will be larger and more detailed than those in previous Ratchet & Clank games, with more diverse environments, challenges, and secrets to discover.

One of the exciting features of Rift Apart is the use of the PS5's SSD, which will allow for near-instant loading times and seamless transitions between planets. This means you'll be able to explore multiple planets without any loading screens, making the game feel even more immersive and action-packed.

Insomniac Games has also confirmed that the game will feature a new female Lombax character, Rivet, who will be playable in certain sections of the game. This adds a fresh twist to the classic Ratchet & Clank formula and provides more opportunities for exploration and combat.

Overall, Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart is shaping up to be an incredible game, and I'm sure you'll have a blast exploring the galaxy with Ratchet and Clank!
